title: Billy Porter confirms he'll play the Fairy Godmother in live-action Cinderella reboot
text:
Billy Porter confirmed over the weekend that he will in fact play the Fairy Godmother in Sony's live-action reboot of Cinderella.

The Hollywood Reporter revealed on Thursday that the 50 year old actor was in talks for the Fairy Godmother.

Then on Saturday, Porter himself confirmed he's playing the Fairy Godmother during an interview at New Yorker Festival.

Confirmed: Billy Porter confirmed over the weekend that he will in fact play the Fairy Godmother in Sony's live-action reboot of Cinderella

New godmother: The Hollywood Reporter revealed on Thursday that the 50 year old actor was in talks for the Fairy Godmother

'I have a couple movies that I'm working on. I'm gonna be playing the fairy godmother in the new Cinderella movie with Camila Cabello,' he said.

Singer Cabello is playing the title character, with Frozen star Idina Menzel slated to play the evil stepmother.

Casting for other key roles has yet to be revealed, but Sony has already set a February 21, 2021 release date but no production start date has been revealed.

Movies: 'I have a couple movies that I'm working on. I'm gonna be playing the fairy godmother in the new Cinderella movie with Camila Cabello,' he said

Porter was best known as a theater star with a Tony Award for his role in Kinky Boots to his credit, before he was cast as Pray Tell in FX's Pose.

He became the first openly gay actor to with the Outstanding Actor in a Drama Series Emmy for Pose last month.

He will also star in the upcoming Like A Boss alongside Rose Byrne, Tiffany Haddish and Salma Hayek, in theaters January 10, 2020.

Blockers writer-director Kay Cannon is directing from her own screenplay, based on a story by producer James Corden, who is credited with coming up with this new take on the fairy tale classic.

Corden is producing alongside his producing partner Leo Peralman alongside Jonathan Kadin.

No production schedule was given for this new take on Cinderella quite yet.

Along with starring in the film, Cabello is also said to be involved in creating new music for the upcoming film.

Disney released the original Cinderella animated classic in 1950, with the studio also releasing a live-action version in 2015.

Lily James starred as Cinderella in the 2015 live-action film, with Helena Bonham Carter portraying the Fairy Godmother.
